name: Tribulation (Syfeon)
description:
"I'm Sorry my son, I should not have let them taken you. I will get you back. I will fight for you no matter the costs. I love you" - To my Son.

Tribulation is a first-person explorer that will have you on the edge of your seat the whole time. Travel through a frozen, abandoned forest to persevere to find your loving son.  But first you have to activate all terminals to find him past the forest... However, there is a twist.. You aren't the only one out there.. Good luck surviving in this futuristic, high-tension game!

https://twitter.com/Syfe0n
